file_content.text: Hey, let's not get all crazy here.
Clearly, I thought you were someone else.
See there was this other Twi'lek girl, total pain, you know, she kept calling me-- Anyway, long story but sorry about the mix up, you know?
Cada Bliss, you have exploited my people, stolen our artifacts and committed numerous crimes against Twi'leks the galaxy over.
I get it, I get it. You practiced. It's a nice speech. I like it.
Return the Star of Kala'unn, promise to reform and we may show mercy.
Of course. Yeah, I would have done so anyway, you know? Had I known? Reform? Absolutely. Star's right over in that case.
Vette, it's your call. What do you want me to do?
We really going to spare him?
Let him go. He knows we can find him.
Going to take a lesson from you on this one. Kill him. No loose ends.
I would not have shown you such mercy. Don't waste it.
You're lucky Vette is nice.
You are a generous, beautiful, woman. I've always said the Twi'lek woman was a superior being suited to the finest---yeah, I'm going.
Loose ends are a bad idea, Vette.
That's all. [Kill Bliss]
Ugh!
Thought that would make me feel better than it did.
What are you--you're right, maybe it was a bad idea to let him go. But it was my decision.
I'll grab the Star of Kala'unn. We can meet the old gang here on Nar Shaddaa. They'll make sure the Star ends up in a museum. In Twi'lek hands.
Now you two certainly don't look like Corellian art dealers.
Virus, is it possible that we have been deceived? That this clever rat tail thief has caught us unawares?
What did you call me?
No. Not possible.
Then these two have just walked themselves into a very dangerous scenario.
Perhaps you mistake me for someone else. I am a master of the Force.
I'm a Sith, fear me.
Hand over the Star of Kala'unn and this goes easy.
Vette wants her relic.
Dangerous for you. I'm going to tear you both apart and swap your limbs.
I'll kill you horribly.
Do you hear this, Virus?
I hear.
Apparently someone thinks you've never killed a Sith before. Someone thinks Sith scare you.
It's your show. How do we handle this?
Vette, you want to try?
I don't understand what's happening. Am I supposed to be intimidated? Amused?
You two a comedy act?
Cada Bliss, you have exploited my people, stolen our artifacts and committed numerous crimes against Twi'leks the galaxy over.
Virus? Do we have any room in the harem for an exceedingly ugly, underdeveloped rat tail slave girl?
We're full up on ugly.
Then no reason to spare the ugly Sith woman either. Kill them painfully.
Sith probably make bad slaves too. All right, kill 'em both.
Come on, show me how you kill Sith!
Kill me, then. [Attack]
Gladly.
What are you looking at?
